page.title: 13 THE MAINROAD cont.
page.content: Outside our house we had a car skid off the road because it was going too fast and a lorry shed its load of potatoes because it went too fast, both happened in a matter of hours.There is terrible pollution from the traffic.The exhaust fumes smell awful and on a rainy day mud is splashed all over. Our school is right next to the road and we can always smell the exhaust fumes. The noise is terrible and even when you are not on the main road you can hear the lorries thundering past. Houses can gradually deteriorate because of the traffic. There are roughly 68 lorries and 168 cars per hour. People say that the A 17 is now a death trap.
